info.description: This is the documentation for Honeybee energy simulation parameter schema.
info.title: Honeybee Energy Simulation Parameter Schema

SimulationOutput.title: SimulationOutput
SimulationOutput.description: Lists the outputs to report from the simulation and their format.

include_sqlite.title: Include Sqlite
include_sqlite.description: Boolean to note whether a SQLite report should be requested from the simulation.

include_html.title: Include Html
include_html.description: Boolean to note whether an HTML report should be requested from the simulation.

outputs.title: Outputs
outputs.description: A list of EnergyPlus output names as strings, which are requested from the simulation.

summary_reports.title: Summary Reports
summary_reports.description: A list of EnergyPlus summary report names as strings.

DaylightSavingTime.title: DaylightSavingTime
DaylightSavingTime.description: Used to describe the daylight savings time for the simulation.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: A list of two integers for [month, day], representing the date for the start of daylight savings time. Default: 12 Mar (daylight savings in the US in 2017).

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: A list of two integers for [month, day], representing the date for the end of daylight savings time. Default: 5 Nov (daylight savings in the US in 2017).

RunPeriod.title: RunPeriod
RunPeriod.description: Used to describe the time period over which to run the simulation.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: A list of two integers for [month, day], representing the date for the start of the run period. Must be before the end date.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: A list of two integers for [month, day], representing the date for the end of the run period. Must be after the start date.

start_day_of_week.title: Start Day Of Week
start_day_of_week.description: Text for the day of the week on which the simulation starts.

holidays.title: Holidays
holidays.description: A list of lists where each sub-list consists of two integers for [month, day], representing a date which is a holiday within the simulation. If None, no holidays are applied.

daylight_saving_time.title: Daylight Saving Time
daylight_saving_time.description: A DaylightSavingTime to dictate the start and end dates of daylight saving time. If None, no daylight saving time is applied to the simulation.

leap_year.title: Leap Year
leap_year.description: Boolean noting whether the simulation will be run for a leap year.

SimulationControl.title: SimulationControl
SimulationControl.description: Used to specify which types of calculations to run.

do_zone_sizing.title: Do Zone Sizing
do_zone_sizing.description: Boolean for whether the zone sizing calculation should be run.

do_system_sizing.title: Do System Sizing
do_system_sizing.description: Boolean for whether the system sizing calculation should be run.

do_plant_sizing.title: Do Plant Sizing
do_plant_sizing.description: Boolean for whether the plant sizing calculation should be run.

run_for_run_periods.title: Run For Run Periods
run_for_run_periods.description: Boolean for whether the simulation should be run for the sizing periods.

run_for_sizing_periods.title: Run For Sizing Periods
run_for_sizing_periods.description: Boolean for whether the simulation should be run for the run periods.

ShadowCalculation.title: ShadowCalculation
ShadowCalculation.description: Used to describe settings for EnergyPlus shadow calculation.

calculation_frequency.title: Calculation Frequency
calculation_frequency.description: Integer for the number of days in each period for which a unique shadow calculation will be performed. This field is only used if the AverageOverDaysInFrequency calculation_method is used.

maximum_figures.title: Maximum Figures
maximum_figures.description: Number of allowable figures in shadow overlap calculations.

DryBulbCondition.title: DryBulbCondition
DryBulbCondition.description: Used to specify dry bulb conditions on a design day.

dry_bulb_max.title: Dry Bulb Max
dry_bulb_max.description: The maximum dry bulb temperature on the design day [C].

dry_bulb_range.title: Dry Bulb Range
dry_bulb_range.description: The difference between min and max temperatures on thedesign day [C].

HumidityCondition.title: HumidityCondition
HumidityCondition.description: Used to specify humidity conditions on a design day.

humidity_value.title: Humidity Value
humidity_value.description: The value correcponding to the humidity_type.

barometric_pressure.title: Barometric Pressure
barometric_pressure.description: Barometric air pressure on the design day [Pa].

rain.title: Rain
rain.description: Boolean to indicate rain on the design day.

snow_on_ground.title: Snow On Ground
snow_on_ground.description: Boolean to indicate snow on the ground during the design day.

WindCondition.title: WindCondition
WindCondition.description: Used to specify wind conditions on a design day.

wind_speed.title: Wind Speed
wind_speed.description: Wind speed on the design day [m/s].

wind_direction.title: Wind Direction
wind_direction.description: Wind direction on the design day [degrees].

ASHRAEClearSky.title: ASHRAEClearSky
ASHRAEClearSky.description: Used to specify sky conditions on a design day.

date.title: Date
date.description: A list of two integers for [month, day], representing the date for the day of the year on which the design day occurs.A third integer may be added to denote whether the date should be re-serialized for a leap year (it should be a 1 in this case).

clearness.title: Clearness
clearness.description: Value between 0 and 1.2 that will get multiplied by the irradinace to correct for factors like elevation above sea level.

daylight_savings.title: Daylight Savings
daylight_savings.description: Boolean to indicate whether daylight savings time is active on the design day.

ASHRAETau.title: ASHRAETau
ASHRAETau.description: Used to specify sky conditions on a design day.

date.title: Date
date.description: A list of two integers for [month, day], representing the date for the day of the year on which the design day occurs.A third integer may be added to denote whether the date should be re-serialized for a leap year (it should be a 1 in this case).

tau_b.title: Tau B
tau_b.description: Value for the beam optical depth. Typically found in .stat files.

tau_d.title: Tau D
tau_d.description: Value for the diffuse optical depth. Typically found in .stat files.

daylight_savings.title: Daylight Savings
daylight_savings.description: Boolean to indicate whether daylight savings time is active on the design day.

DesignDay.title: DesignDay
DesignDay.description: An object representing design day conditions.

name.title: Name
name.description: Text string for a unique design day name. This name remains constant as the object is mutated, copied, and serialized to different formats (eg. dict, idf, osm). It is also used to reference the object within SimulationParameters. It must be < 100 characters, use only ASCII characters and exclude (, ; ! \n \t).

dry_bulb_condition.title: Dry Bulb Condition
dry_bulb_condition.description: A DryBulbCondition describing temperature conditions on the design day.

humidity_condition.title: Humidity Condition
humidity_condition.description: A HumidityCondition describing humidity and precipitation conditions on the design day.

wind_condition.title: Wind Condition
wind_condition.description: A WindCondition describing wind conditions on the design day.

SizingParameter.title: SizingParameter
SizingParameter.description: Used to specify heating and cooling sizing criteria and safety factors.

design_days.title: Design Days
design_days.description: A list of DesignDays that represent the criteria for which the HVAC systems will be sized.

heating_factor.title: Heating Factor
heating_factor.description: A number that will be multiplied by the peak heating load for each zone in order to size the heating system.

cooling_factor.title: Cooling Factor
cooling_factor.description: A number that will be multiplied by the peak cooling load for each zone in order to size the heating system.

SimulationParameter.title: SimulationParameter
SimulationParameter.description: The complete set of EnergyPlus Simulation Settings.

output.title: Output
output.description: A SimulationOutput that lists the desired outputs from the simulation and the format in which to report them.

run_period.title: Run Period
run_period.description: A RunPeriod to describe the time period over which to run the simulation.

timestep.title: Timestep
timestep.description: An integer for the number of timesteps per hour at which the energy calculation will be run.

simulation_control.title: Simulation Control
simulation_control.description: A SimulationControl object that describes which types of calculations to run.

shadow_calculation.title: Shadow Calculation
shadow_calculation.description: A ShadowCalculation object describing settings for the EnergyPlus Shadow Calculation.

sizing_parameter.title: Sizing Parameter
sizing_parameter.description: A SizingParameter object with criteria for sizing the heating and cooling system.
